description:
Everyone from Quest Dorm goes to Nanami`s home country, the Principality of Bladefield, and runs into Nanami`s little sister Hakua, and the crown prince. Then there`s big news about Hakua and Nanami. Then No. 0 talks to Hatate about the founding fairy tail of the country.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: J`espère qu`un jour, on fera à nouveau la fête ensemble
Mata Itsuka, Koushite Minna Issho ni Omatsuri ni Ikeru to Ii na
Someday, It`d Be Nice If We Could All Go to a Festival Together Again
أتمنى أن نستطيع كلنا الذهاب إلى المهرجان معًا مرة اخرى
またいつか, こうしてみんな一緒にお祭りに行けるといいな
